review: Doctor was very friendly and explained the issue in simple language and helped me with steps to deal with my issue.

No complaint from doctor. But there was a long wait time. My appointment was at 12:30 but we got chance to meet the doctor after 1:30p.m.

As far as doctor is concerned - she is very nice and patient. She gave full time and suggested appropriate course of actions.
On lighter note: first doctor whose handwriting a common man can read! :)

Doctor showed up really late and I had to wait for a longer time. Even though I selected the first available slot, another patient was allowed to go before me. Also, the doctor's consultation charges are 600 but they are charging 300 extra for doctor's PPE kit. **** **** *** ** ***** ** ****** *** *** ****** ***** ******* *** **** **** ** *** ** ************ ******* ** ***** ** ***** ****** *** **** ** ***** **** ****** ***** ******* ** ** ******* ** *** ******* *** ******* ****** *** *** **** ** *****

Dear team,

It's been more than an hour, I am waiting for a meeting with doctor.

It seems it's first come first serve , no benefits of booking it through practo. It's frustrating and top of that they are asking me extra money for registration. I am highly disappointed with practo. You should have made it clear in the beginning itself that they goona charge extra fees which is of no use to me in future.
Though they have made bill at 6:36 but my consultation has not started yet. They are very clever and so as practo. 

Request you to look into this.I waited till 7:10 my appointment was at 5:40
Very friendly doctor. Explain the patient well. She advised me with proper medication and diet to follow on a daily basis.
This was my revisit and I absolutely love how doctor explains the issue and gives treatment. she is very polite and listens to the patient well

great experience so far, she was very supportive and understood the problem and gave the right solution

It's really tough to find help when you are going through comorbidities. Good for regular checkup but don't expect much help with comorbidities. Nobody wants to spend time to understand root cause of problems.
